item.title: Resume
item.description:
Explore my professional experience below.

üåê AWS Developer ‚Äì Toyota Canada Inc. (Sep 2024 ‚Äì Present) üê• Enhanced operational efficiency by 40% by developing Python-based automation scripts within GitLab CI/CD for AWS tasks, including tagging updates and EBS volume analysis.
üê• Improved cloud security by designing a multi-tier AWS VPC architecture using CloudFormation, with integrated subnets, NACLs, and multiple availability zones.
üê• Optimized cost management by 50% using AWS CUDOS, S3, Athena, Glue, and QuickSight for actionable insights on cloud expenses.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Explore some of my recent projects, ranging from industry experience to personal innovation.

üöÄ Toyota Innovation Hackathon Led a team in developing autonomous AGV navigation with ROS, reducing delivery times by 30%. Leveraged Python, ROS, Ubuntu, and VMware to optimize efficiency and reliability. Outcome: Enhanced collaboration and implemented robust algorithms, significantly streamlining team operations.

üñãÔ∏è Embedded Handwriting Recognition ML Software Built a real-time handwriting recognition system for embedded platforms, achieving 90%+ accuracy. Designed with Python, OpenCV, TensorFlow Lite, and Raspberry Pi for smooth, on-device performance. Outcome: Delivered accurate classification on low-power hardware with minimized latency.
